DOC.brief_summary: A dose finding study evaluate safety effectiveness FK778 kidney transplant patient
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate FK778 Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient end stage kidney disease need retransplantation ( loss graft nonimmunological reason ) . Patient fully inform . Patient immunological high risk and/or previous graft survival shorter 1 year due immunological reason . Patient significant liver disease . Cold ischemia time donor kidney > 28 hour . Patient uncontrolled concomitant infection and/or severe diarrhoea , vomit , active upper gastrointestinal tract malabsorption active peptic ulcer . Patient previously receive receive organ transplant kidney .
